body: Bruh, why isn't there more for this anime?

I enjoy Aki getting fucked by some random guys, it is so exciting and frustating. The authors drawing is so erotic for both the doujinshi and anime/manga. But the anime is so shit, I didn't watch it, only the fan service part but I can see how shit it is. I am in love with Aki so actually seeing her becoming slut to dicks make me so enraged. Especially when a ugly guy has the power to make her slut. Make sense story wise but I would have prefer a pretty boy so I could imagine me more. To bad that the author is maybe a fat ugly man. 
And seriously aki at 12 is bae, we only saw her like 30s but she has already big breasts, Would had smashed her at 12!! How could she still stay a virgin?? I mean actually every girls in it is approximatly virgin. They are made for the Mc, which is why it is shit.
Needed some more story in it
its better when they translated the rest of it
this was a godtier thank you for the succ sensei

reupload huh
classic one, thx for reminding
gonna read all the sequel now
